summary: Dashboard UI was refactored to render PortfolioOverview and HoldingsManager directly (no tabs), which appears to remove the Staking Rewards tab entrypoint. However, the diff also includes unrelated changes (auth hook edits and project metadata/summaries) not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrelated modifications to Internet Identity/auth hook implementation (not part of removing a Dashboard tab).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to remove the Staking Rewards tab/navigation entrypoint from the Dashboard UI; it does not request auth/login behavior changes.
BuildRequest does not request adding repository/project state files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/maintained a generated-style frontend file summary listing many components and behavioral claims.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request documentation/summary generation files; also includes extra feature assertions unrelated to the tab removal.
